comment.author: 53461717@N08
comment._content: see www.loc.gov/pictures/item/2007677283/ www.loc.gov/pictures/item/2002709898/ Library of Congress > Prints & Photographs Reading Room > Prints & Photographs Online Catalog > and www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2536794768/ The picture was taken in front "LaCasa de Adobe" near Ciudad Juárez, Chihuahua, when the city capitulated to Francisco I, Madero revolutionary forces on May 10, 1911.

comment.author: 53461717@N08
comment._content: In www.inehrm.gob.mx/Portal/PtMain.php?pagina=ex p-camino-a-j... Nr. 8 is identified as Alberto Fuentes Dávila. In es.wikipedia.org/wiki/Alberto_D._Fuentes_D%C3 %A1vila there is a picture of Mr. Fuentes and a short biobraphy. in www.nevadaobserver.com/Mexican%20Revolution%2 0-%20People/... Alberto Fuentes Dávila is Nr 9 (8 of this picture)
